Address.value: 60 HIGH TECH CAMPUS,P.O.BOX 80073, EINDHOVEN, 5656 AG, Netherlands

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: NXP Semiconductors is a leading supplier of high-performance mixed-signal products. The firm acquired Freescale Semiconductor in 2015 and now has significant market share in the automotive market, where it supplies microcontrollers and analog chips into automotive clusters, powertrains, infotainment systems, and radars. NXP Semiconductors also serves industrial and Internet of Things, mobile, and communications infrastructure.
